code: @Test public void testPayloadIsTransformed() throws InterruptedException {     mockOut.setExpectedMessageCount(1).     mockOut.message(0).body().isEqualTo("Modified: Cheese").     producerTemplate.sendBody("Cheese").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testPayloadIsTransformedAgain() throws InterruptedException {     mockOut.setExpectedMessageCount(1).     mockOut.message(0).body().isEqualTo("Modified: Foo").     producerTemplate.sendBody("Foo").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
